title: Northern hemisphere of dwarf planet Ceres
description: This image, taken by NASA's Dawn spacecraft, shows a portion of the northern hemisphere of dwarf planet Ceres from an altitude of 915 miles (1,470 kilometers). The image was taken on Sept. 21, 2015, and has a resolution of 450 feet (140 meters) per pixel.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
